mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.menu_name AS "menuName", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.order_num AS "orderNum", a.url AS "url", a.target AS "target", a.menu_type AS "menuType", a.visible AS "visible", ifnull(a.perms,'') as "perms", a.icon AS "icon", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_menu a
AND a.menu_name like concat('%', #{menuName}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( menu_name, parent_id, order_num, url, target, menu_type, visible, perms, icon, create_by create_time ) VALUES ( #{menuName}, #{parentId}, #{orderNum}, #{url}, #{target}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET menu_name = #{menuName}, parent_id = #{parentId}, order_num = #{orderNum}, url = #{url}, target = #{target}, menu_type = #{menuType}, visible = #{visible}, perms = #{perms}, icon = #{icon}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = sysdate() WHERE id = #{id}
